summary: The diff updates LilyCard to render an inset hover background via an absolutely positioned layer with z-index ordering and pointer-events disabled, using theme-aware muted color and opacity transition. No clear missing functional requirements are evident from the provided diff summary, but there are unrelated project/meta file modifications not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) including new_feature_requests entries (AR-1..AR-3) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a frontend hover/interaction/theming fix; it does not request changes to project tracking metadata.
The BuildRequest does not request documentation or summary-file updates; it focuses only on LilyCard hover background behavior.
